title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters dialog has the following issues:

a. Buttons are too small.

b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.

c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.

d. The dialog becomes huge for methods with many parameters.

e. The validation for duplicated parameter names could be performed on the first page.

f. The columns in the dialog could be merged.
